subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Pérez baffled the Yankees for seven and two-thirds innings and the Mets rode Endy Chávez’s two-run homer to win the first of three games at Shea Stadium.
snippet: Oliver Pérez baffled the Yankees for seven and two-thirds innings and the Mets rode Endy Chávez’s two-run homer to win the first of three games at Shea Stadium.
